column4: yay, i just switched from amd64 to the 32 bit dapper.  now I have to relearn how to install the goodiez , the easy way.  I had a bunch of pre built packages for 64.
TrevorT; installing anything is a pain. and you have to either build things yourself or use old ass pre built packages that are way out of date.  so i just switched to 6.06.1 32bit
you might try gentoo for 64 bit
